alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Gordon; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 3:24AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with very heavy rain will impact portions of Floyd, Gordon, Polk and Bartow Counties through 500 AM EST... At 323 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms with very heavy rain was along a line extending from near Fairmount to near Esom Hill, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Be prepared to take action if a Flash Flood Warning is issued. Locations impacted include... Rome, Cartersville, Calhoun, Cedartown, Adairsville, Rockmart, Euharlee, Aragon, Cave Spring, White, Kingston, Plainville, Taylorsville, Shannon, Cassville, Fairmount, Ranger, Pinson, Esom Hill and Redbud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
